channel.title: OIL -- Time Flies [Pop (kinda), Odd Time Signature]
channel.description:
A simple song alternating between 4/4 and 13/16. Who knew that 5 bars of 13/16 fits perfectly into 4 bars of 4/4?
[Here it is: Time Flies!](https://soundcloud.com/oil-official/time-flies)
Hope you like!
